channel.title: How to add new visualisation type?
channel.description: I have application running locally. How can i add new visualisation type.

item.title: How to add new visualisation type?
item.dc:creator: jfnxcore
item.description:
Hello vikash, I am very late with my answer, I hope you have solved your problem since then… For those who would like to create an extension that adds a new visualization to Redash, here is a proof of concept from which you can experiment with: redash-candlestick. I used redash-stmo as a base example for the Python extension and React/JSX bundle. I’m not a frontend developer, so I was heavily inspired by the visualizations found in the redash/viz-lib library as an example for the React / Plotly graph.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add new visualisation type?

Welcome to the forum! I know that we’re in the process of migrating all the visualizations to React, so the procedure might change a little. But here is a relevant post about this subject from a few years ago.
